settings.product_conditions_title: I agree with terms and conditions
settings.delivery_content:
SHIPPING
  • All orders are shipped within 24-48 hours if placed before 1:00 p.m. EST Monday - Friday
  • You will receive shipping confirmation once shipped. We recommend using "Arrive" by Shopify at checkout.
  • Free Shipping applies ONLY for the US continental territory. It doesn’t include Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico or any US island.
  • All orders must be shipped to the delivery address on your order.
  • We cannot change the shipping address in your transaction to any other address after purchase.
  • We do no ship to P.O. BOX addresses and/or APO or FPO addresses.
  • For more information on Shipping, visit our Shipping Policy page or FAQ
RETURNS AND EXCHANGES
  • Easy and complimentary, within 14 days
  • We do not accept returns on opened, used products, empty containers/pots, special or customized orders.
  • No returns on all sales items. All sales are final!
  • See conditions and procedure in our return FAQs

settings.sub_title_about_texts_1:
A great About Us page helps builds trust between you and your customers. The more content you provide about you and your business, the more confident people will be when purchasing from your store.

Your About Us page might include:

  • Who you are
  • Why you sell the items you sell
  • Where you are located
  • How long you have been in business
  • How long you have been running your online shop
  • Who are the people on your team
  • Contact information
  • Social links (Twitter, Facebook)

To edit the content on this page, go to the Pages section of your Shopify admin.

settings.notification_cookies_text: This is a standard cookie notice which you can easily adapt or disable as you like in the admin. We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website.

settings.contentfaq: If you are en esthetician looking to provide your clientele with the best service, it is crucial that you have the best waxing products. Our goal is to provide estheticians and students with the best waxing products available today. Nacach wax products are imported from Italy and made with the finest ingredients carefully selected for flawless results so your clients keep coming back for more. No harmful chemicals or unnatural substances, ever.

settings.subtitlefaq: What Supplies Do I Need As An Esthetician?
settings.contentfaq: Regardless of your experience, any professional or aspiring esthetician should always be equipped with a complete collection of products to meet different needs. People have different types of skin and hair, so it is important that you have a diverse lineup of waxing products that includes different waxes, lotions, warmers, and accessories.

Nacach waxing products and supplies can be bought online on Nacach.com. All our products, from our waxes to lotions, are guaranteed to arrive at your doorstep by their estimated delivery date, so you can start delivering flawless results right away.

At Nacach, we specialize in all things waxing. In addition to our best-selling waxes, Nacach offers a wide selection of waxing supplies and accessories to make the most of your services. Check out our collection of supplies to learn more.

Hard wax is a type of wax mostly used for hair removal procedures involving the bikini area, underarm, face, and other delicate parts of the body. Unlike soft wax, hard wax does not require strips to be removed, which is why hard wax is also known as stripless wax.

Before using hard wax, or any type of wax, it’s important to make sure the skin is cleansed of all dirt, makeup, sweat, and lotions. This enables the wax to adhere to the area effectively. Once the skin is ready for waxing, follow the next steps:

Pour the wax warmer and heat until wax beads are completely melted.
Using a clean spatula, apply hard wax in layers of about 2-3 mm in the direction of hair growth.
Wait a few moments until it cools, then quickly and firmly peel off against the direction of hair growth.
For more detailed instructions on how to use each of our products, click on the respective product.

settings.subtitlefaq: How To Use Hard Wax Beads?
settings.contentfaq: Hard wax comes in different shapes, but they are all applied using the same method described above. Nacach hard wax comes in the shape of tiny beans, or beads, so you can measure and control exactly how much hard wax you want to use each time.
Nacach hard wax beads can be bought on Nacach.com. All our hard wax varieties are imported from Italy, where they are made with the best ingredients to ensure premium quality and flawless results.
